name: Ammar Alghafari
responsibility_sentences: developed and implemented comprehensive security policies and procedures
conducted cybersecurity awareness training for staff
performed regular vulnerability assessments and penetration testing
utilized Nessus for regular vulnerability assessments
conducted penetration testing to identify and address network vulnerabilities
ensured smooth and secure network operations in healthcare and military environments
leveraged Apex One, Deep Security, Endpoint Detection and Response, and Intrusion Detection Systems for security management
managed Active Directory including user access and group policies
managed and configured FortiGate firewalls for security enforcement
managed incident response efforts to address and mitigate security breaches
